original_text: Aaron then brought the offering that was for the people. He took the goat for the people’s sin offering and slaughtered it and offered it for a sin offering as he did with the first one.
korean_text: 그가 또 백성의 예물을 드리되 곧 백성을 위한 속죄제의 염소를 가져다가 잡아 전과 같이 죄를 위하여 드리고

sentences.original_text: He took the goat for the people's sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 백성의 속죄제를 위한 염소를 가져갔고

sentences.original_text: and offered it for a sin offering
as he did with the first one
sentences.korean_translation: 첫 번째 것을 한 것과 같이 하였다
